indicator: abuser preventing person from accessing education, social opportunities or seeing friends
abuser removing mobility or communication aids
abuser leaving person unattended when they need assistance
abuser preventing person from meeting religious or cultural needs
abuser preventing person from expressing choice or opinion
abuser preventing person from meaningful occupation, activities or stimulation
addressing a person in a patronising or infantilising way
air of silence when a particular person is present
change in the psychological state of a person
being non communicative or non responsive
unusual behavior usually attributed to dementia (e.g., sucking, biting, rocking)
